Author: sugarysweet24
Text: Same boat!! I started smoking for other reasons but Iâ€™m also quitting and I feel you on being afraid of weight gain. Idk if it will help you but smelling strong candles, perfume, etc and having a cup of tea or coffee anytime you want to smoke helps w cravings (both for smoking and food and it reminds me that I have more reasons for quitting than not, like better sense of smell, more energy, more money, etc)
